title: STAT+: Dozens of hospitals demand better security for patient record sharing in letter to officials
description: Over 60 health systems asked national health record exchanges to take action to prevent “bad actors” from accessing patients’ health information.
content: Over 60 health systems asked national health record exchanges to take action to prevent “bad actors” from accessing patients’ health information.
